long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hyperlink Summariser - Never break your reading flow

Tired of getting sidetracked by hyperlinked articles while reading online? Hyperlink Summariser is here to help! This extension allows you to instantly summarise a web page and all its hyperlinked references without ever leaving the current article. Stay focused and get quick summaries of the linked content, so you never lose your reading flow.

Key Features:

- Summarise the current page and all hyperlinked references in it, without leaving the page.
- Summarise concisely for a quick review or in detail for a comprehensive overview.
- Simple and distraction-free interface - No sign-ups, email requests, or annoying subscription prompts.

Requirements:

- You'll need an OpenAI API key to use this extension. Generate an API key and add the necessary credits in just two minutes here: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys.
- On average, a dollar should yield at least 200 summaries ( this is a rough estimate and may vary depending on the length of the articles you choose to summarise. )

Privacy:

- Your OpenAI API key is stored securely in your browser and is only used for API requests.
- No summaries or personal data are saved. The extension operates entirely within your browser, with the only external requests being made to OpenAI API and the URLs you choose to summarise.

Note: This tool is only functional with free and openly accessible web pages; it does not support those that require a login or payment for access.
